componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: Click on Submit to NDA Helpdesk to route the agreement to NDA Helpdesk as your request does not qualify for self service.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: ﻿Click Generate to produce a standard pre-approved NDA document.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: Your request has been submitted to NDA Helpdesk

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: Click on Send for Adobe Sign to send the document for eSignatures; Click on Send for Signatures to send the document for wet signatures.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Click on ‘Generate’ to generate the document from Nokia Template.

Click on ‘Import Offline Document’ and upload the customer document, in case of customer paper.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Please make sure that all the below listed fields have data before activating the agreement:

Agreement Number - Customer Provided, Agreement Name, Account Legal Entity, Nokia Legal Entity, Agreement Start Date, Term (Years) OR Agreement End Date

visibilityRule.booleanFilter: (1 AND 3 AND 4 AND 5 AND 6) OR (2 AND 3)
(1 AND 3 AND 4 AND 5 AND 6) OR (2 AND 3) OR (1 AND 7)

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: Note: Requestor of the contract will be defaulted as the first Nokia signer. If there is a seco﻿nd signer, please populate the signatory in the field called 'Nokia Signer 2'.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: For any issues or queries, please reach out to CLM Support at clm.services@nokia.com
